Summary Business and marketing leader with over 15years’ experience in the IT and telecommunications sector. A natural driver of change, passionate about achieving business impact across business and marketing disciplines, by having a laser focus on delivering customer relevance and value.  
 
Proficient in managing people, budgets and end-to-end integrated marketing programs. A comfortable strategist, communicator and implementer with specialist expertise in developing and deploying demand generation, and sales acceleration initiatives for leading blue-chip technology companies.  
 
Highly results-focused, passionate and pragmatic, with the ability to consult, critically evaluate, and recommend successful strategies that increase revenue and build stronger relationships with customers and business partners 
 
Partner management, project management, campaign management and budget management experience. Creative, with strong people, problem solving and commercial skills. Straight forward, customer focused and results driven. A proven ability to continually adapt to new challenges and deliver. Summary I’m a Marketing, Communications, and Program Management professional who believes that the best communication, program and project management are born out of understanding human behavior. At Cisco Systems, I have managed projects and programs where understanding what motivates people and why people behave the way they do is paramount to success.  
 
I’m completely at home project managing geographically diverse teams and facilitating collaboration across different groups with different cultures. As a result, I have lead many successful product and solutions launches and re-defined the launch process for multi-billion dollar Cisco routing, switching, security, and wireless products and solutions on a global scale.  
 
From a communications perspective, I have extensive experience writing executive communications, internal communications, website and intranet content, social networking and blog content, newsletter content, and programs messaging.  
 
Writing is my passion. I have been writing for pleasure since I was a child and professionally since 1997. 
 
Specialties:  
Project Management  
Communications 
Social Media 
Writing/Editing 
Program Management 
Project managing geographically dispersed teams 
Change Management 
 
Received ESI Associates Certificate in Project Management in 2007 
 
Relevant Development Courses: 
 
• Microsoft Excel  
• Microsoft PowerPoint 
• ESI Scheduling and Cost Control 
• ESI Introduction to Project Management for Project Team Members 
• ESI Project Leadership, Management and Communication 
• ESI Management Projects  
• Social Media for Cisco Channels  
• Social Media Roundtable 
• Making Social Media Work for Your Events

Summary I am passionate about marketing, customer journeys and customer experience. I believe that every employee is a marketer regardless of the department they work in. Anyone that comes into contact with a customer or anything that has a customer touch point is in the business of marketing. I enjoy empowering my colleagues to be fearless marketers and encourage all marketing to be human.  
 
As the world becomes digitised, consumers have a louder voice and have more purchasing muscle. With so many brands competing for consumer’s attention, I want to ensure that my brand delivers a personalised message to the right customer at the right time. It’s this human and personalised experience that attracts and retains consumers. 
 
With over 15 years of strategic and hands on experience as an international communications and marketing manager, I’ve supported complex and fast moving organisations. I'm a strong communicator and influencer and a bold and dynamic team player. I enjoy working collaboratively across the business with internal stakeholders and engaging with employees of all levels. Digital disruption and the Internet of Things has forced marketing to evolve. I am a fearless marketing leader and am passionate about the future of marketing which I believe is personalised customer journeys and marketing in ‘real-time’. 
 
Key Skills: 
 
•	International communication and marketing  
•	Strong negotiator and influencer. 
•	Program management. 
•	Awareness, demand and lead generation experience including digital, live & online events, email, direct mail, partner, channel and SP marketing. 
•	Developing content, communications, and audience acquisition strategies for audience led marketing. 
•	Customer Advocacy Programs 
•	Agency/vendor selection and management.  
•	Marketing Collateral Development.  
•	Partner management and relationship development. 
•	C-Level and employee engagement via written and verbal communications.  
•	Budget Planning.  
•	Public speaking and engagement. Summary I am passionate about marketing, customer journeys and customer experience.
